name: AirwayEx
storyline: Explore the world of anesthesiology and bronchoscopy through AirwayEx
summary: Perform challenging airway procedures, sharpen your intubation skills, assess sedation levels, and earn CME with Airway Ex, the first professional video game for practicing anesthesiologists, CRNAs, respiratory therapists, anesthesia assistants, and other medical professionals who perform airway procedures.
